definition: History of Zhou of the Northern Dynasties, twelfth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Linghu Defen 令狐德棻[Ling2 hu2 De2 fen1] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 50 scrolls
surname Zhou/Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
book/letter/document/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]/to write
another name for History of the Five Dynasties between Tang and Song 舊五代史|旧五代史
pinyin: Liang2 Tang2 Jin4 Han4 Zhou1 shu1

sentences.english: Chapter III is the grammatical analysis of"Yizhoushu"Verbs.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是對《逸周書》動詞的語法分析。

sentences.english: Chapter two war thought of view carry on the discussion to《YI ZHOU SHU》mainly.
sentences.chinese: 第二章主要對《逸周書》戰爭觀方面的思想進行探討。

sentences.english: Chapter IV discussed the monosyllabic verb and two-syllable verb in detail about"Yizhoushu"Verbs.
sentences.chinese: 第四章分述《逸周書》中的單音節動詞和雙音節動詞。

sentences.english: Chapter V the article classify the"Yizhoushu"verb from the prospective of semantic.
sentences.chinese: 第五章從語義角度對《逸周書》動詞進行分類。

sentences.english: Section three we have investigated the attitude towards war of 《YI ZHOU SHU》.
sentences.chinese: 第三節我們考察了《逸周書》對待戰爭的態度。

definition: Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
Mr Gongyang's Annals or commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history, probably written by multiple authors during Han dynasty, same as 公羊春秋[Gong1 yang2 Chun1 qiu1]

to know how to count and do sums/numerate/numeracy

phonetic component of a Chinese character
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)

Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
to tremble/to be on guard
